verses.text: \w Open|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H6605"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*, \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, so that fire may devour \w your|strong="H6605"\w* cedars.

\w Wail|strong="H3213"\w*, pine-tree, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cedar \w is|strong="H7703"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*. \w Wail|strong="H3213"\w*, oaks \w of|strong="H3293"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* inaccessible \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w Listen|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wailing|strong="H3215"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*! \w Their|strong="H3588"\w* \w glory|strong="H1347"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*. \w Listen|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*! Blasted \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* thick forest \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* me: \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* destined \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*,

whose \w possessors|strong="H7069"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H2550"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7462"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* guilty! \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* say, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*! \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w pity|strong="H2550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* earth, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* everyone \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w is|strong="H3068"\w* devastated \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w shepherded|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* sheep-merchants. \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w staffs|strong="H4731"\w*: \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Mercy \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Union. \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w shepherded|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* set aside \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H1571"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w*; \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H5315"\w* indignant \w against|strong="H1571"\w* \w them|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H5315"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w were|strong="H5315"\w* displeased \w at|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*. What \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w let|strong="H7604"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. What \w is|strong="H1320"\w* set aside, \w let|strong="H7604"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* set aside. \w And|strong="H4191"\w* \w let|strong="H7604"\w* those \w who|strong="H7604"\w* \w are|strong="H1320"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w devour|strong="H7462"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H7468"\w*’s \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w*, Mercy, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w broke|strong="H6565"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w break|strong="H6565"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w broken|strong="H6565"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sheep-merchants \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w watched|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*’s \w message|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* said \w to|strong="H5869"\w* them, “If \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w give|strong="H3051"\w* \w me|strong="H3051"\w* \w my|strong="H2308"\w* \w wage|strong="H7939"\w*. If \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, don’t.” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H8254"\w* \w my|strong="H2308"\w* \w wage|strong="H7939"\w*, \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1004"\w* – \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* wage \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w valued|strong="H3365"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*! \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w broke|strong="H6565"\w* \w my|strong="H6565"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* called Union so \w as|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* dissolve \w the|strong="H6565"\w* brotherhood between \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Jerusalem.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w implements|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worthless \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H6485"\w* \w about|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land. \w Those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1245"\w* thrust \w down|strong="H7665"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w*. \w Those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1245"\w* \w scattered|strong="H5289"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w out|strong="H1245"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* wounded \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sick \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6965"\w* \w whole|strong="H7495"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w devour|strong="H7462"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w hoofs|strong="H6541"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w tear|strong="H6561"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* worthless \w shepherd|strong="H7473"\w*, \w who|strong="H1945"\w* deserts \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*! \w May|strong="H2719"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* strike \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*. \w May|strong="H2719"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w completely|strong="H3001"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*. \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* blinded.
